text: The Mayor shall promulgate rules to implement §§ 47-859.01 through 47- 859.04 within 180 days after [July 7, 2009].
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-10, see notes following § 47-859.01.

Delegation of Authority

Delegation of Authority Pursuant to D.C. Law 18-10, the NOMA Residential Development Tax Abatement Act of 2009, see Mayor's Order 2010-61, April 23, 2010 (57 DCR 3509).

DC CODE § 47-859.05

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Real Property Assessment and Tax. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Authority and Procedure to Establish Real Property Tax Rates.

heading.catch_text: Tax abatements for new residential developments --Rules.
